node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `nodeparam` ( `node_id` int NOT NULL, `paramkey` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `paramvalue` varchar(512) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `nodeparamidx` (`node_id`,`paramkey`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: nodeparam
